Package commands.turtle_commands

Class Summary
Back Takes input pixels, changes x or y values based on the angle orientation of the turtle.
Direction Direction handles making new states, when a turtle's degree is shifted makeOrienatation must be implemented depending on the direction in which one would like to rotate.
Forward Takes input pixels, changes x or y values based on the angle orientation of the turtle.
Home Returns the turtle to the 0,0 coordinate (center of the grid) and resets the orientation of the turtle to the default orientation.
Left Rotates the turtle left, by shifting the angle by -90 degrees.
Movement Movement handles making new states when a turtle moves in given direction (forward or backward) and returns the new state of the turtle.
Right Rotates the turtle left, by shifting the angle by 90 degrees.
SetHeading Turns the turtle to face an absolute degree given.
SetXY Moves the turtle to a given set of coordinates x,y on the screen.
Towards Changes the orientation of the turtle to be facing coordinates x,y as specified.
TurtleCommandOneInput  
TurtleCommandTwoInput
